name: KinderPerfect: Tween Expansion Pack

black_cards.text: _ is the moment my kid lost their innocence.
_ is why I have gray hair now.
_ is why I'm not a chaperon.
_ is worse than _.
Before they were teenagers, my biggest worry was _, but now I fear _.
For such a "know-it-all" tween, they were not ready for _.
Graduation should put an end to _.
How you found out you're no longer the cool parent.
I can't wait for my kids to outgrow _.
I told myself I'd be the cool parent and accept _, but I was wrong.
I'm afraid to talk to my kids about _.
No one warned me about tweens and _.
Other parents worry about _ but I stress over _.
Parenting is all fun and games until _.
The best part of having a teenager is _.
The fastest route to parental PTSD.
The fastest way to embarrass your kids is to tell their friends about _.
The real reason they don't want to go to school today.
The school counselor wants to talk to us about _.
Today's annoying attitude is brought to you by _.
Why I don't snoop in their room anymore.
Why our kid is slamming doors today.
Why our kids cannot have co-ed sleepovers.
Why we are the meanest parents on earth.
